hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export old_client_id=`cat /usr/local/docker-config/httpd/psamaui_settings.json | grep client_id | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed 's/\",*//g'` export old_client_secret=`cat /usr/local/docker-config/wildfly/standalone.xml | grep client_secret | cut -d '=' -f 3 | sed 's/[\"/\>]//g'` export old_tenant=`cat /usr/local/docker-config/httpd/psamaui_settings.json | grep auth0domain | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed 's/\",*//g'`
sed -i "s/$old_client_secret/$AUTH0_CLIENT_SECRET/g" /usr/local/docker-config/wildfly/standalone.xml sed -i "s/$old_client_id/$AUTH0_CLIENT_ID/g" /usr/local/docker-config/wildfly/standalone.xml sed -i "s/$old_client_id/$AUTH0_CLIENT_ID/g" /usr/local/docker-config/httpd/psamaui_settings.json sed -i "s/$old_tenant/$AUTH0_TENANT/g" /usr/local/docker-config/httpd/psamaui_settings.json sed -i "s/$old_tenant/$AUTH0_TENANT/g" /usr/local/docker-config/wildfly/standalone.xml
